actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A bill to provide for the appointment of several officials of the Congress by the Speaker of the House of Representatives or the President pro tempore of the Senate.

summary.text: Provides for the appointment of the following officials of the Congress alternately by the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the President pro tempore of the Senate: the Public Printer, the Librarian of Congress, the Comptroller General, the Deputy Comptroller General, and the Architect of the Capitol.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the appointment of several officials of the Congress by the Speaker of the House of Representatives or the President pro tempore of the Senate.
